name: Caldwell - Pacific Standard - Short Corona
additionalNotes: Caldwell Pacific Standard - Pacific Standard is a west coast exclusive cigar. Available now for a short time in limited quantities at Renegade Cigars. The Caldwell Pacific Standard features an Ecuadoran Corojo wrapper and has an Ecuadoran Sumatra binder with filler leaves from the Dominican Republic. This medium bodied cigar is sweet and savory and has tasting notes of leather, fruit and earth.
